Events

$5 Happy Hour

Monday January 19th

Every Weekday (Mon - Fri)

Clock out and enjoy the best deal of the week. Every Monday through Friday from 4–7 p.m., grab $5 select drinks and bar snacks like Fried Pickles, Mac ‘n Cheese Bites, and Loaded Fries. It’s the easiest win of the day.

04:00 PM - 07:00 PM

Tacos. Tequila. Tuesday.

Tuesday January 20th

Every Tuesday

Tuesdays aren’t so bad when they come with $3 tacos and $5 Cazadores tequila. You know what to do.

Whether you're short on time or just prefer convenience, online ordering is a great way to get your food from our restaurant. It's quick and easy, and your order will be ready for pick-up or delivery in no time.

what people say

Review by - Google

Nathan P:

Great spot for lunch, good food and drinks, Low Country Burger was awesome!!!

Review by - Google

Susan P:

This was the best restaurant we went to during our time in Charleston. Went on Thursday evening for drinks and then took food back to the hotel...

Review by - Google

Kaitlyn A:

Wonderful restaurant and bar. Laid back, affordable, excellent service! Boyfriend had Texan Burger and said it was amazing...

Review by - Google

Kayla D:

Very relaxed chill atmosphere. The food was great bar food. We got 1 of almost every appetizer, a meal each, plus drinks...

Review by - Google

Spencer L:

Great experience! Cheese bites and the wings are so good! Great atmosphere for kids thru the day as well adults. Definitely a must check it out.
